Text:
Hi 20-40,
You are a Gem !!
I dint expect "Hustle" and i am glad you included it :-)
Thank you so much.

Twentyforty,
     I am sorry, you must think i am barraging with requests. But i just want you to consider one more very good movie to encode.
Madeo(Mother)
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1216496/

Yesterday only its bluray has been uploaded. If you think its worth encoding then plz do it. If you don't, its absolutely fine. Just wanted to bring to light a good title. Thats it. (Just in case-480p preferred). :)

Thanks.

Will you be doing the Golden Globes?

Thank you for Human remains.
I don't think much of Insecurity, seems very silly, or is it just me ?
I Absolutely love Insecurity so Thanks dude - disregard the guy above me!
